body: overlay hooks dismiss method now works (
made it easier to tell if alert is scrollable in MD mode (
use initialize function when setting up ionic angular to avoid config errors (
closing an item can no longer be interrupted (
overlay hooks memorised properly to prevent re-renders (
non-scrollable popovers no longer have forced overscroll (
tapping status bar correctly scrolls content to top (
select method now has correct types (
item-sliding accounts for multiple ion-item elements (
only inherit color if color property is set on ion-item (
nested tabs now go to correct page (
role attribute can now be customized (
modal now mounts child component independently of other modals (
safe area padding now added when slot="top" (
pass HTML attributes to host element (
pass arbitrary HTML attributes to host element (
name: 5.8.0 Calcium

body: AlertButton role now has correct types (
label now only takes up as much space as needed when slotted (
dragging reorder item to bottom no longer gives out of bounds index (
router guards are now fire correctly when written in a component (
add IonicSlides module for Swiper migration, deprecate ion-slides (
deprecated virtual scroll in favor of solutions provided by JS frameworks (
name: 5.7.0 Potassium

body: correctly determine when to load image when scrolling quickly on slower devices (
custom animation is now used correctly (
using router.go now shows correct view (
change event interfaces correctly use TypeScript generics for value (
onEnd now correctly fires even if the event target was removed from the DOM  (
opening item while other items are open no longer requires multiple swipes (
IonTabs no longer causes SSR to fail (
improve accuracy of ion-page dev warning (
tabs warning about user-provided router outlet change is now correctly logged (
header, subheader, and icon alignment better matches native ios (
buttons are now disabled during page transitions (
mirror disabled prop to aria attribute (
custom aria-label can now be set (
overlay interfaces are now exported from framework packages and documented (
improve reliability of swipe back gesture when quickly swiping back (
typescript interface has correct return value for progress methods (
double tapping back button no longer causes app to go back 2 pages (
buttons using fill and color properties now account for hover and focused opacity variables (
using multiple items with inputs no longer results in console warnings (
IonTabs can now accept IonRouterOutlet, deprecated default router outlet in tabs (
swipe to close modal is no longer swipeable on footer (
inherit padding for iOS title in a toolbar (
prevent error from being thrown when testing on certain jest runners (
subheader no longer overlaps action sheet buttons (
reflect color property as an attribute for vue (
knob can now have an accessible name (
remove @ionic/core dependency in @ionic/react-router to resolve yarn install warning (
support history@5 in preparation for react router 6 (
guards are now triggered on initial navigation (
redirects now account for query string (
animation no longer jumps on large skeleton text elements (
resolve prototype pollution in swiper v5 (
large title scale animation is now correct in rtl mode (
warnings are no longer generated when running tests with ng test (
screen readers no longer read content behind overlays (
refresher now only activates when pulling down on MD (
use correct history mode when doing ssr to avoid errors (
back button goes back to proper tab on angular 11.2.10 (
remove hardware back button event listener when NavManager is unmounted (
undefined error is no longer thrown after destroying and quickly re-creating ion-slides (
components inside of ion-nav are now unmounted properly (
overlay events can now be listened for without the "on" prefix, deprecated "on" prefix event listeners (
only render a main element when content is being used in primary view (
only add aria-labelledby if there is an adjacent label (
pressing spacebar correctly unselects radio with allow-empty-selection (
callback refs now work correctly with ionic components (
dynamic tabs are now correctly recognized (
update props when navigating to new parameterized route (
swiping back quickly no longer causes app to get stuck (
overlays now correctly unmount any child components after dismissing (
correct view now chosen when going back inside tabs (
prevent click event from firing twice (
account for event name changes in vue 3.0.6+ for overlay components (
components now integrate properly with vee-validate (
update tslib to resolve export errors (
correctly show ion-back-button when going back (
detail icon now respects rtl mode (
overlays now present correctly when using custom elements build (
detail icon is no longer announced by screen readers (
properly float labels for non-input items (
only pass tab event props from IonTabs to IonTabBar if defined (
progressEnd no longer errors when pulling quickly in MD native refresher (
passing params as props are correctly updated when switching pages (
improve support for ids with special characters when getting label element (
collapsed toolbar is no longer incorrectly shown when using ion-refresher (
only show placeholder with floating label when focused (
use correct theme colors in dark mode (
pressing space no longer jumps screen to bottom of page (
onIonTabsWillChange and onIonTabsDidChange event handlers are now properly bound to IonTabs (
navigating using ion-back-button now selects correct page (
tab buttons no longer throw an error if href is undefined (
correctly remove active state from tab button when navigating away from tab (
prevent race conditions when opening overlays (
add parts for more design customization (
add react hooks to control overlay components (
add composition API ionic lifecycle hooks (
name: 5.6.0 Argon
